TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Here you are sir. We call it "The Bill".

Waiter, Some stew in my soup please.

Just a moment, sir. I'll catch something and substistewte it there.

Bartender! Stop lighting the alcohol shots. Every burning shot is warming the atmosphere and fills it with carbon oxides.

Oh geez, good call! Imagine if these shots filled the atmosphere with carbon DIoxide!"

Waiter, there's dry ice in my soup!

Yes, it is in our patented soup proof container, guaranteed to keep it dry.

Waiter, a block of warm Ice for my soup please.

We call it Neptune soup, as there are several sorts of hot ice in the Neptune.

Waiter! Just Cola with ice. With heavy ice. With heavy water ice.

Here you go, and we have thrown in a free Contol Rod to go with it.

Waiter, a microscope please, so I can see what is in my soup.

Yes, it's a microscope there.

Waiter! Pepsin Cola, please.

Here you go, use at your own risk, we use it to turn a side of beef into broth.

Waiter, a pizza soup please.

Your pizouppa, sir. With probably anchovies, but mayb they are mushrooms.

Bartender! Do you sometimes clean the bar from dancing footprints?

No Sir. This is not Coyote Ugly.

Waiter, some soup to sup for supper please.

It is souperior today!

Sommelier! Is this tequila from 1954,  made of four-year cacti, gathered at the south-east slope of the Coyot Hill next to the dry arroyo, to the West from the red hills?

Yes.

Waiter, some Agave soup please.

Your soup, sir, with more pins in it.

Kitchen-gardener! Why have you dug the potatoes in ground? Should we stick our heads in it to eat?

Please Sir, just wait for the Minecraft ticks and then we will make you some nice potato soup.

Waiter, why is that customer sticking their face in my soup?

Pay no attention, he is always doing this. We call him Soupface.

Barbie Q! Where is my barbecue?

Just Oppen it with the heimmer damnit!
Waiter, why the hell did i have to bring this terrible pun on this post? Did you took it from someone's soup, right?

No, sir. From the left one.

Barbie! Queue. Move faster, people are waiting.

Just wait, order's coming from literally everywhere i can't even with timing!
Barbie or Waiter, Queue. What is your real name, the first or the latter, and on regards of my soup, why is there smoke coming out of it?

The soup is losing its atmosphere.

Waiter! Am I the third person trying to chew this?

I assure you that nobody else has tried to chew their spoon.

Waiter, some Funion soup please.

All ive got are funyons sorry

Waiter! Maid Marian is hiding in my soup!

125204022024

Don't worry, it's just another attack of your pareidolia. Eat it.

Made Marian! Get out of his soup!

 

Edited April 2 by kerbiloid

That is Waitress to you sony Jim, I was just straining it.

Waitress, is that a guy (of Gisbourne) in my soup?

It's Ivan Hoe. G*y Gisbourne went out to M*rry men.

Brian de Bois-Guilbert, hurry up to the table! Reginald Front de Boeuf and Philip de Malvoisin are almost ready with front de beef and malvasia!

Just give them a few minutes, they're making a side for your soup.

WAITER! MY SOUP HAS NEUTRONIUM IN IT! I DIDN'T ORDER THAT!
